channel.title: Afghanistan on BalleWale Cricket News
channel.description: Recent content in Afghanistan on BalleWale Cricket News

item.title: Seifert and Phillips Conquer Afghanistan Spin to Script Convincing New Zealand Win
item.description: New Zealand's Seifert and Phillips excel against Afghanistan's spin attack, leading their team to a decisive victory in the World Cup clash.

item.title: Afghanistan Pack Their XI with Spinners, Ask New Zealand to Field
item.description: Afghanistan opts for a spin-heavy lineup against New Zealand in their World Cup clash, emphasizing their strategic approach in the tournament.

item.title: Afghanistan Opt for Spin-heavy Line-up Against New Zealand in World Cup Clash
item.description: Afghanistan's strategic decision to field a spin-dominant XI against New Zealand highlights their tactical approach in the World Cup.

item.title: Injury-hit New Zealand Eye Revenge as Afghanistan Look to Run It Back
item.description: New Zealand faces Afghanistan in a crucial World Cup clash, seeking redemption after previous encounters amidst injury challenges.
